snippet: Anthonello, the Japanese early-music ensemble, mixed Japanese and Western styles at St. John the Divine.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by Japanese early-music ensemble Anthonello at the Cathedral Church of St John the Divine.
lead_paragraph: Anthonello, the Japanese early-music ensemble, mixed Japanese and Western styles at St. John the Divine.
